news.title: Cradle and the Convert Show
news.content: Our Executive Director, Will Jude, was recently interviewed by the Cradle and the Convert Show on 88.9 WDCR about his personal mission experience in Haiti and Reiser Relief’s impact. Click here to listen to the interview!

news.title: Check Out Our Summer Newsletter!
news.content: Partner spotlight, Marfranc updates, education highlights and more!

news.title: Pray for Peace
news.content: We pray for peace in Haiti. The Haiti we know is kind and gentle, beautiful and spiritual. The recent civil unrest does not define the country or its people. The images of unrest do not tell the whole story. We remain committed to our mission of empowering and engaging the people of Haiti in Christ's name.

news.title: A New, Redesigned Website
news.content: We have just redesigned our website! The new website includes many features such as user interface improvements and speed increases.

news.title: THANK YOU
news.content: Your support at our fall event was incredible. Missed the event and still want to participate? We are raising funds to support 4 Reiser Relief schools in Haiti. Support us on Give to the Max Day.

news.title: Buy your tickets for our fall event!
news.content: Our fall gala is a great way to connect with others who desire to lift up and empower the least among us.  Join us! Buy your tickets today!

news.title: Fall Gala is FRIDAY November 10
news.content: Save the date! Our fall gala is Friday, November 10. 5:30pm silent auction and social time, 7pm dinner and program. Minneapolis Marriott Northwest.  Optional - stay the night! Book your group rate for Reiser Relief.  Event ticket information coming soon.

news.title: Our latest newsletter
news.content: We are delighted to share the impact of your support in Haiti!

news.title: Join us! 11th annual Keep the Wheel Turning Event
news.content: Thursday, April 27, 2017. 6-9pm. $10 admission at the door. Includes soft drinks and appetizers. Cash bar. Honor the legacy of Fr. Reiser!

news.title: Thank you!
news.content: We are grateful for all of you! Thank you Give to the Max Day supporters, volunteers and event attendees!

news.title: Hurricane Matthew Relief
news.content: Thank you for your support. Please pray for the people who suffered damage from this devastating storm.

news.title: Join us on November 16!
news.content: Tickets are available. Event info.

news.title: November 16 - Save the Date!
news.content: Our 4th annual "Give to the Max Day Kickoff Event" will be on Wednesday, November 16 at the Minneapolis Marriott Northwest in Brooklyn Park, Minnesota. More information is coming soon.

news.title: Spring 2016 Newsletter
news.content: Click here to read our latest newsletter.

news.title: New bathrooms in Marfranc
news.content: The walls are rising! We will post updates on our Facebook page when possible. Thank you supporters.

news.title: Thank you supporters and volunteers!
news.content: We greatly appreciate your on-going support of our annual Keep the Wheel Turning Event! Reiser Relief would not exist without you. We have a few photos of the event on our Facebook page.

news.title: Reiser Relief marking 10 years of help in Haiti.
news.content: Thank you ABC Newspapers for covering our upcoming event!

news.title: Save the date! April 19th, 10th Annual Keep the Wheel Turning Event
news.content: We are looking forward to our next event on April 19th at the Legion in Coon Rapids, MN. Tickets are $10 at the door. Click here for more information, or check out our event on Facebook.

news.title: January 2016 Mission Team
What a success!
news.content: The results are in for our 2015 Give to the Max Day event. At the November 11 event we raised $52,000. In addition, we received online and mail-in donations of over $36,000 for a total of $88,299. THANK YOU! We are humbled that, through your support and by the grace of God, we are able to continue to provide comfort, dignity, and hope to the vulnerable adults in Marfranc, and the materially poor in Haiti.

news.title: Thank You!
news.content: We are humbled and honored by your generosity, Reiser Relief supporters. Our Give to the Max Day event was a smashing success exceeding our expectations. God challenged us to be lights of hope to the most vulnerable in Marfranc, Haiti. You rose to that challenge. Alleluia.

news.title: Why Marfranc?
news.content: November 12 is Give to the Max Day, a Minnesota 24-hour online fundraising event hosted by GiveMN. We are raising funds for a new ministry in Marfranc, Haiti. We invite you to watch our "Why Marfranc?" video and fundraiser video. To make a difference in the lives of these vulnerable Haitians, please visit our GiveMN fundraising page.   We have a $10,000 matching grant on November 12, which gives you a chance to double the impact of your donation. God Bless!

news.title: Purchase your 11/11 event tickets now!
news.content: Join us on Wednesday, November 11! Ticket information. Event information. Fundraiser information.

news.title: New water truck made it to Port au Prince!
news.content: After delays in getting through customs, the new water truck is out and ready to get to work delivering free, clean water to the poor and vulnerable. This is an answer to prayers. Thanks for your support.

news.title: Honoring the legacy
news.content: Our 9th annual Keep the Wheel Turning Event was an excellent gathering of supporters passionate about serving the poor and honoring the legacy started by Fr. Reiser. Over $29,000 was raised in donations and pledges at the event, enough to fund the education of 483 children! In addition, to date we received over $16,000 in donations via mail. Combined we raised enough to fund the education of 759 children. What an incredible blessing.  Praise God! Thank you ABC Newspapers for covering the event. Click here to read more.

news.title: Thank you!
news.content: Our 9th annual Keep The Wheel Turning Event was a smashing success! We will update you soon on how many children we were able to help attend school for the next year.  Thank you supporters.

news.title: Tickets Available!  9th Annual Keep the Wheel Turning Event
news.content: Join us on April 21 from 6-9pm for our 9th annual Keep the Wheel Turning Event at the American Legion in Coon Rapids, MN.  Tickets purchased before April 17 are $8.  Tickets purchased at the door are $10.  We look forward to an excellent evening of "Honoring the Legacy" of Fr. Reiser in Haiti.  Buy your tickets now!

news.title: Join us at Feed My Starving Children
news.content: A Reiser Relief team is packing meals at Feed My Starving Children in Coon Rapids on Friday, March 6, 2015, from 6-7:30pm.  Sign up here to join us!

news.title: Save the Date!
news.content: Our annual Keep the Wheel Turning Event will be on Tuesday, April 21, 2015.  More details to follow.  Mark you calendars!

news.title: Happy New Year!
news.content: Thank you, supporters, for a wonderful 2014.  We are welcoming the new year with a mission trip to Haiti January 5-12.  Please keep this team of 16 in your prayers on follow them on our blog as they strive to connect, learn, transform and respond to the needs God places in front of them.

news.title: Thank You 2014 GTMD Supporters!
news.content:
Thank you for joining us in person, on-line and by mail for our 2014 Give to the Max day event.  The results were spectacular.  Your selfless donations of time, talent and treasure will provide clean water to thousands of families in Cite Soleil, Haiti.  You helped us raise over $52,000--enough to purchase a new water truck to sustain this ministry of compassion. What an incredible blessing.

Matthew 25:35 "For I was hungry and you gave me something to eat.  I was thirsty and you gave me something to drink."

How Great Thou Art!  Ala ou gran!

news.title: His work, Our Hands
news.content: Here's a link to a wonderful article from the St. Croix Valley Peach about one of our short term missionaries in Haiti.  Page 1.  Page 2.

news.title: 12 Hour Auction-November 14 only!
news.content: TODAY ONLY! Online auction for "Christmas in Minneapolis" valued at $450. We'll take bids from 8am to 8pm. Highest bidder at 8pm WINS! Fun evening includes: -$100 gift certificate at Sea Change restaurant located in the Guthrie Theater. -Two tickets to A Christmas Carol play at the Guthrie. -One night hotel stay plus breakfast at the Minneapolis Club. A late check out will allow you to enjoy the new Holidazzle Village on Nicollet Mall. Must be used between Nov 15 - Dec 28, 2014. All proceeds go to our efforts in Haiti. Bids only taken on our Facebook site. GOOD LUCK!

news.title: Give to the Max Day has arrived!
news.content: Join us Wednesday, November 13, for a Minnesota statewide day of on-line giving.  We are raising funds for our water ministry in Cite Soleil Haiti.  Learn more on our GiveMN site or from our new YouTube video. Hourly Golden Tickets are worth $2,000 this year -- and Super-Sized Golden tickets have a value of $20,000.  GiveMN.org does an hourly random drawing to award Golden Tickets throughout Give to the Max Day.   Every donation you make increases our chances of winning a prize. Let's join together to fill buckets with clean water!

news.title: Give to the Max Day 2014
news.content: Join us on-line for Give to the Max Day on November 13, 2014.  This 24-hour statewide fundraiser hosted by GiveMN.org can make a meaningful difference in the lives of poor Haitians.  Funds raised this year will sustain water delivery in Cite Soleil started by Fr. Bernard Reiser in 2005.  GiveMN now allows you to schedule your donation for November 13 any time after November 1, 2014.   Each donation on that day is like a ticket for $1,000 hourly drawings and a $10,000 cash prize at the end of the day for two lucky non-profits.  Learn more here!

news.title: Buy your tickets now!
news.content: Join us November 12, 2014, 6pm, at our Give to the Max Day Kickoff Event at the Minneapolis Marriott Northwest in Brooklyn Park. Guest speaker, Minnesota Bound TV Host Ron Schara.  Buy tickets online or by mail.   Tables for 10 people are $300 or individual tickets are available.  Individual tickets purchased before November 8, $30.  After November 8, $35. To purchase by mail, make checks out to Reiser Relief, write "GTMD Dinner" on memo line, and mail to Reiser Relief, 16385 Baywood Lane, Eden Prairie, MN 55346.

news.title: Save the Date-Give to the Max Day Kickoff Event November 12, 2014
news.content: We are planning our third annual kickoff to this on-line statewide collaborative giving day for non-profit organizations.  Join us for an exciting evening at the Marriott Northwest in Brooklyn Park.  If you would like to donate a live or silent auction item for the event please contact us. For more information on the fundraiser click here.

news.title: July 7-14 Mission Team
news.content: Our July 7 mission team is ready to connect, learn, transform and respond in Haiti.  Please keep us in your prayers.  Follow us on our blog.

news.title: Make Every Day Count
news.content: Click HERE to read an inspiring article in the Minneapolis Star Tribune about our board member, Doris Schulte; our founder Fr. Reiser; and the power of prayer.

news.title: An Excellent Event!
news.content:
Thank you to all our wonderful Reiser Relief supporters who attended our 8th annual Keep the Wheel Turning Event on April 23.  We were pleased with the turnout and bolstered by your encouragement, smiles and support.

We raised $28,000 at the event and $16,000 in mail in donations.  We surpassed our goal of  raising  $33,000.  Your support and generosity will allow us to fund a re-model of Sacred Heart Christian Home for abandoned women in Port au Prince, Haiti.  This badly needed remodel will add more beds, replace existing soiled mattresses, add a bathroom with bathing facilities appropriate for elderly ladies, provide a small outdoor patio, and make for better end of life care for the ladies who live there.  We will keep you updated on the progress of the remodel.  God's blessings to you all.  Continue to pray for the poor, elderly and homeless people of Haiti.

news.title: Blog of the Week
news.content: We have a team serving in Haiti April 21-27, 2014.  Follow them on their blog.

news.title: A New, Redesigned, Website
news.content: We have just redesigned our website!  The new website includes many features such as user interface improvements, responsive design and speed increase. Feel free to let us know what you think.  Your feedback is always appreciated.

news.title: Rockstar Row
news.content: Exciting news! We were featured on Twin Cities Live’s “Rockstar Row” on Friday, April 18! Thanks to all who tuned into KSTP-TV (Channel 5) at 3pm to cheer on Reiser Relief. A group of volunteers was there proudly wearing our blue t-shirts.
